game.name: DYNASTY WARRIORS: ORIGINS
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, HDR available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 압도적인 전장의 일기당천 상쾌 액션! 이름 없는 영웅이 그리는 삼국지, 「진・삼국무쌍」 시리즈 신작.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Become immersed in exhilarating battles as a nameless hero in the Three Kingdoms

reviewHighlights.text: Perfectly set up to have your own created custom character..... this doesnt exist and that is a failure in an otherwise 9 out of 10 game.
I wanted to love this game, but it's repeatedly committing the sin that I feel makes or breaks this kind of experience, though I fully understand some...
